message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $900000. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value.

I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $750000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $825000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and the market demand. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I still think $750000 is a more reasonable price. I'm willing to compromise, so I'll offer $775000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable going as low as $775000. I'm willing to make one more significant concession, so I'm counteroffering at $850000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle this time.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I think $800000 is a fair price. I'm not willing to go any higher than that.
